💡Most hotels and resorts in the Maldives offer a wide range of activities and amenities that guests can enjoy without leaving their rooms, such as private pools, spa treatments, room service, and more. However, it is recommended to explore the beautiful beaches and marine life of the Maldives, as they are some of the top attractions of the country.🥰🙌
